usbsimulator.protocol.packet module

class usbsimulator.protocol.packet.USBPacket(pid: PidField, fields: list[USBField] = None, crc_function: callable = None)[source]

Bases: object

Abstract class for USB packet.

Implements the default function to get the bits of a USB packet and auto-update the CRC of the packet when an attribute is set.

Parameters:

  • pid (PidField) – PID of the packet

  • fields (list[USBField] or None) – Additional fields of the usb packet

  • crc_function (callable[list[int], list[int]] or None) – the function to compute the crc of the packet

get_bits(with_crc=True, with_pid=True)[source]

Get the bits of the packet in the right order for transmission

Parameters:

  • with_crc (bool) – Does the function has to return the crc

  • with_pid (bool) – Does the function has to return the pid alose

Returns:

All the bits of the packet, LSB first

Return type:

list[int]

length_in_bits()[source]

Return the length in bits of the packet

Returns:

Length in bits of the packet

Return type:

int

class usbsimulator.protocol.packet.TokenPacket(pid: PidField, address: AddressField, endpoint: EndpointField)[source]

Bases: USBPacket

Class representing a USB Packet of type token. Please see 8.4.1 from USB1.1 specification.

Parameters:

  • pid (PidField) – the PID of the packet

  • addr (AddressField) – the address in the token packet

  • endpoint (EndpointField) – the endpoint of the token packet

Example (create a TOKEN_IN USB packet):

 1from usbsimulator.protocol.packet import TokenPacket
 2from usbsimulator.protocol.field import Pid, PidField, AddressField, EndpointField
 3
 4pid = PidField(Pid.TOKEN_IN)
 5addr = AddressField(0x1ae)
 6ep = EndpointField(0b101)
 7
 8tin_packet = TokenPacket(
 9    pid=pid,
10    address=addr,
11    endpoint=ep
12)
class usbsimulator.protocol.packet.StartOfFramePacket(framenumber: FramenumberField)[source]

Bases: USBPacket

Class representing a USB Packet of type StartOfFrame. Please see 8.4.2 from USB1.1 specification.

Parameters:

framenumber (FramenumberField) – The frame number of the packet

Example (create a FrameNumber USB packet):

1from usbsimulator.protocol.packet import StartOfFramePacket
2from usbsimulator.protocol.field import FrameNumberField
3
4frame_nb = FramenumberField(0x0)
5
6p = StartOfFramePacket(frame_nb)
class usbsimulator.protocol.packet.DataPacket(pid: PidField, data: DataField)[source]

Bases: USBPacket

Class representing a USB Packet of type Data. Please see 8.4.1 from USB1.1 specification.

Parameters:

  • pid (PidField) – The pid of the datapacket

  • data (DataField) – The data in the datapacket

Example (create a DATA0 packet):

 1from usbsimulator.protocol.packet import DataPacket
 2from usbsimulator.protocol.field import Pid, PidField, DataField
 3
 4pid = PidField(Pid.DATA_DATA0)
 5data = DataField(
 6    b'A very important data that I want to send on the USB bus'
 7)
 8
 9data_packet = DataPacket(
10    pid=pid,
11    data=data
12)
class usbsimulator.protocol.packet.HandshakePacket(pid: PidField)[source]

Bases: USBPacket

Class representing a handshake USB packet. Please see 8.4.4 from USB1.1 specification.

Parameters:

pid (PidField) – The pid of the handshake packet. Must be Pid.HANDSHAKE_ACK, Pid.HANDSHAKE_ACK or Pid.HANDSHAKE_STALL.

Example (create ACK and NACK packets):

 1from usbsimulator.protocol.packet import HandshakePacket
 2from usbsimulator.protocol.field import Pid, PidField
 3
 4# In case of an ACK
 5pid = PidField(Pid.HANDSHAKE_ACK)
 6ack_packet = HandshakePacket(pid)
 7
 8# In case of a NACK
 9pid = PidField(Pid.HANDSHAKE_NACK)
10nack_packet = HandshakePacket(pid)
